description:
Lulu was purchased by http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] along with her younger half-sister http://anidb.net/ch92285 [Arisa]. Her great-grandfather was Japanese. She is seen as ugly due to the different beauty standards in the world of Death March, even though she is extremely beautiful in the eyes of the Japanese. She was born in Kuvork Kingdom.
Source: Death March Wikia
name: Lulu
